I have a question about fame.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: I have a question about fame.
By Breeder Jarn on Sunday, December 16, 2007 - 07:19 pm:

How do you guys get 100 fame? It seems like I'll do a show, only get 12 fame, and within two weeks I'll be down to ten, or nine. Once I got down to zero, though I probably misread that. Can you guys help me understand the Fame system?

Thanks,
IB

By Lady Neptune on Monday, December 17, 2007 - 04:33 pm:

I'm not too sure myself. Maybe just try to stay in one place and do as many shows there as possible to keep it up?

By darklao on Monday, December 17, 2007 - 10:59 pm:

Have you been giving up or failing out of any guild missions? IIRC (and it's been a long time), both of these severely junks your fame in ALL regions.
